rows.label: qev041801_MSG0001
rows.name:
Food! Fooood! Adjunct Pisa must hurry up and serve
Popote poron-tulip pollen![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041801_MSG0002
rows.name: Popote JUST ate! Maybe Popote eat too much...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041801_MSG0003
rows.name:
Besides, caravan is short on food recently.
As leader, Popote should set example and—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041801_MSG0004
rows.name:
This order AS leader! If Pisa keep being insubordinate,
Popote sentence her to tickle torture.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041801_MSG0005
rows.name: This total HR violation...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041801_MSG0006
rows.name:
Popote also head of HR. Very convenient.
Now do what Popote say or face tickle torment![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041801_MSG0007
rows.name:
...Hmm? What does human friend want?
Why is friend here? ...Did friend bring snacks?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041801_JNK0010
rows.name: Explain

rows.label: qev041801_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Popote about Ngogo's request.

rows.label: qev041801_JNK0020
rows.name: Offer

rows.label: qev041801_SEL0021
rows.name: See if Popote wants to eat one of your travel rations.

rows.label: qev041801_MSG0008
rows.name:
Gimme! *Hnomfohmnomnomnom* ...Muh?
PTTTTTTTBBBBBBBBBBTTTT! Meh-meh! So gross!
Why would friend feed Popote such blandness?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041801_MSG0009
rows.name: Popote is hip foodie who eat only finest of pollens.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041801_MSG0010
rows.name: ...Huh? Ngogo sent friend to request fireworks show?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041801_MSG0011
rows.name:
...And Popote has to come see Grampypon?
Mehhhhhh. Just HEARING friend say it sounds boring.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041801_MSG0012
rows.name:
But Popote have no choice. Order from Elder
Grampypon must be obeyed, even if Elder
Grampypon wheezy old letch.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041801_MSG0013
rows.name:
But material shortages in caravan mean there is no way
to make fireworks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041801_MSG0014
rows.name:
Perhaps friend can help gather some infernium and
autiga powder?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041801_MSG0015
rows.name:
Oh oh! Meh! And poron tulips, also!
Do that, and Popote will light stupid fireworks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041801_MSG0016
rows.name:
Popote starving! If friend wants fireworks,
hurry up and bring materials. Oh, and poron tulips![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041801_MSG0017
rows.name:
*sniff* *sniff* That smell... Poron tulips!
Hand over already![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041801_MSG0018
rows.name:
And if friend has also found fireworks materials,
please give to Pisa.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041801_MSG0019
rows.name:
Mmm, these are top-quality tulips. Pisa? ...PISA!
How come Pisa not always bring Popote good stuff
like this?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041801_MSG0020
rows.name: Because no good tulips grow even remotely close to—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041801_MSG0021
rows.name:
Silence! No backtalk! Popote is leader of caravan,
and leader demand absolute submission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041801_MSG0022
rows.name: Rgh... Tyrant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041801_MSG0023
rows.name:
Oh, and Pisa will go see grampypon of Popote in place
of Popote. No way Popote going to travel that far.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041801_MSG0024
rows.name: WHAAAAT?! No. Not that. Absolutely nothing but that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041801_MSG0025
rows.name:
Every grand council meeting, Elder Nan harass
Pisa nonstop. If Pisa had recourse to sue, Pisa would
have retired off damages by now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041801_MSG0026
rows.name:
Neat story. Very sad. Popote not care.
...Friend agrees that Pisa should go, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041801_JNK0040
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev041801_SEL0041
rows.name: Agree that Nan would probably like it if Pisa went.

rows.label: qev041801_JNK0030
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev041801_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell Popote that it's his responsibility.

rows.label: qev041801_MSG0032
rows.name:
Friend is maybe bit smarter than [ST:gender p1=he p2=she ] look.
Maybe Popote use friend as adjunct while Pisa gone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041801_MSG0033
rows.name:
This not FAIR! Pisa never done anything to deserve such
horrid treatment![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041801_MSG0034
rows.name:
Sorry! Two votes to one. Pisa can leave fireworks to
Popote. Say hi to Grampypon for Popote.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041801_MSG0035
rows.name:
...Well? Get going already. Or would Pisa like to stay
for more tickle torture?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041801_MSG0036
rows.name:
Harassment at one end, extortion at other...
Entire family of Popote seriously messed up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041801_MSG0027
rows.name:
Yes, exactly! Plus, if Pisa is gone,
fireworks will not get made right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041801_MSG0028
rows.name:
Pisa will go announce to caravan that Popote
leaving to be with Elder Nan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041801_MSG0029
rows.name:
Ah! Come back! ...Rrrrgh! Pisa got away.
And once she tell the others Popote is going,
no way to back down without losing face.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041801_MSG0030
rows.name:
Popote REAAALLY not want to, but suppose
there's nothing for it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041801_MSG0031
rows.name: Hmph... Friend better be thankful![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041801_MSG0037
rows.name: Popote hungry! Give Popote food, Grampypon![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041801_MSG0038
rows.name: *cough* Why did Popote even bother coming?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041801_MSG0039
rows.name: Popote handle fireworks or whatever. Probably.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041801_MSG0040
rows.name:
Oh, and if friend sees Pisa, get her to bring back
flowers from that area.[ST:wait ]
